description: Discover how to make bread at home with this easy recipe. All you need are four ingredients, which you probably have in your kitchen already. No yeast or rising time required.
keywords: Bread,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Video,Low sugar,Sesame free,Baking,Halal,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Vegetarian,Low fat,Peanut free
name: Easy Bread Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3.5 cup plain flour (plus extra for dusting)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220°C/200°C fan-forced and line an oven-proof lidded casserole pot with baking paper. Place casserole pot with lid on in oven to preheat.
Combine milk and lemon juice in a jug and leave to stand for 5 minutes.
Place flour, baking soda and 2 tsp salt in a large bowl, stirring to combine. Add milk and lemon juice mixture and stir until a shaggy dough forms.
Dust a clean work surface with flour, turn out dough and knead until smooth, then form into a tight ball.

Carefully remove the hot casserole pot from the oven, remove the lid, and place the ball of dough inside. Using a small sharp knife, score a cross into the top, then cover and bake for 30 minutes. Remove lid and cook uncovered for 20 minutes or until bread is a deep golden colour. Leave to cool slightly before serving.
